sub_fields.label: Modal delay (seconds)
sub_fields.name: modal_delay
sub_fields.instructions: This will determine how long the modal will appear after the page loads.

sub_fields.label: Modal display time (seconds)
sub_fields.name: modal_display_time
sub_fields.instructions: This will determine how long the modal will be visible on the page. Leave it blank if you don't want to make the modal to automatically close.

choices.success-message: Change newsletter content to success message

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions:
You can use the ff. characters to separate each content

Comma (,) - to separate each cell content.

Pipe (|) - to separate each column.

Newline (enter) - to separate each row
